entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
